New Records: The Milwaukee Brewers set a franchise record with their highest scoring game, finishing with 15 runs
Key Match Events: Willy Adames hit a grand slam as part of a two-homer night
Garrett Mitchell added a two-run homer
Pre-Game Insights: The Brewers were expected to win with odds in their favor
Post-Match Reflections: The victory was highlighted as a pivotal moment in the Brewers' playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second of a three-game series
Chase Field hosted the game with 44,886 attendees
